omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
		distinct
			Postcode,
			Country,
			NHSNumber
	from [OMOP_SUS].[omop_staging].[sus_OP]
	where NHSNumber is not null
	and Postcode is not null

omopColumns.name: zip
omopColumns.operation_description: Uppercase the postcode then insert the space in the correct location, if needed.
omopColumns.query:
select
		distinct
			Postcode,
			Country,
			NHSNumber
	from [OMOP_SUS].[omop_staging].[sus_OP]
	where NHSNumber is not null
	and Postcode is not null

omopColumns.name: location_source_value
omopColumns.query:
select
		distinct
			Postcode,
			Country,
			NHSNumber
	from [OMOP_SUS].[omop_staging].[sus_OP]
	where NHSNumber is not null
	and Postcode is not null
